title: BOUGHT RP WHILE THE RP SERVER WAS DOWN!!!
body: I bought a $25 RP card and put it in the code about 20 minutes ago and I have not received anything !! What's going in!!! And the the little notification is down about the RP system!?!?

replies.body:
As you have probably seen from the numerous other posts with the same issue:

>Wait a while after the server maintenance is over, just to be sure it isn't credited to your account after this. 
If it isn't please send in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with the relevant information and they will sort you out. 
Please keep in mind that player support is busy and it may take a lil while for them to get back to you (almost always reply within a week). **During this time do not lodge multiple tickets or continue adding information to your existing ticket**, as it may send your enquiry to the back of the queue.

When is the maintenance over then like 2months? 
i want to buy some hextech chest to open so badly now. Hurry riot
What i did was i sent through a "technical issue" answered all the questions and successfully submitted a ticket from that link in your post. do you know how long until a confirmation?
Due to the number of requests they are going to be having, I would say 48 hours for your first response (don't hold me to it though),
its my first time on the boards and forums.. haha im just trying to be sure to behave and all.. but thank you. yes im just out of it i thought i could be opening up hextech boxes tonight ..

Hi, They are working on this issue at this very moment. Please do send a support ticket about this issue and also do take note that several players are affected by this, therefore the player support would be extremely busy but they are probably doing their best. Send one support ticket and just wait, DO NOT SEND more than ONE ticket. They would get back to you max of a week.
hey I am having the same problem!! )::: please contact me or reply to this if you have found a solution! thanks a lot
